name: login
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a name that you enter in order to be able to use a computer system: Type your login at the prompt. Now you can access electronic resources from anywhere with a single login.
[ C or U ] an act of entering your name in order to be able to start using a computer system: These records document the user name and time of login. We have the time and date of the last login for each user. Compare
logout
[ C or U ] a place on a screen where you click (= press) and enter a name in order to start using a computer system: We have added a login to the home page. Go to login and enter your username. See also
log in/on
More examplesFewer examplesWhat happens if a user navigates to a page that requires a login?Don't use your date of birth as your log-in.You are asked to enter your login and password.Logins should be at least 8 characters long.People still fall for phishing scams that ask users to update their log-in information, and then deliver the information to a cybercriminal.This is a set of protocols used by the Internet to support services such as remote login.The system requires multiple logins.I am presented with a fresh screen with a login prompt at the top of it.
